sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menyapa teman saya di pagi hari.
english translation: I greet my friend in the morning.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Polisi mengejar pencuri itu di jalan raya.
english translation: The police chase the thief on the highway.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu merawat anaknya yang sedang sakit.
english translation: The mother takes care of her sick child.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lampu pijar menyala di rumah-rumah saat malam hari.
english translation: Incandescent lamps light up in houses during the night.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia tidak paham apa yang sedang kita bicarakan.
english translation: He doesn't understand what we are talking about.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Siswa tersebut sangat cerdas dalam memahami pelajaran.
english translation: The student is very smart in comprehending lessons.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami mengenang kenangan indah bersama.
english translation: We remember the beautiful memories together.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pria tersebut sangat tampan dan berwibawa.
english translation: The man is very handsome and charismatic.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Masalah ini terlalu rumit untuk diselesaikan dalam waktu singkat.
english translation: This problem is too complicated to be solved quickly.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dokter tersebut sangat ramah terhadap pasiennya.
english translation: The doctor is very friendly towards his patients.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak laki-laki itu sering kali nakal di sekolah.
english translation: That boy is often naughty at school.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya merasa ragu apakah saya memilih yang tepat.
english translation: I feel doubt about whether I made the right choice.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami memutuskan dengan mantap untuk menerimanya.
english translation: We decide firmly to accept it.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Baju saya basah karena terkena hujan.
english translation: My clothes are wet because of the rain.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Penyediaan makanan adalah kebutuhan utama mereka saat ini.
english translation: Food supply is their main necessity at the moment.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mohon tutup pintu setelah selesai keluar.
english translation: Please close the door after you finish going out.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong buka jendela agar udara segar masuk.
english translation: Please open the window for fresh air to come in.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kucing tersebut sangat ganteng dan imut.
english translation: The cat is very handsome and cute.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Topi ini sangat enteng dan nyaman dipakai.
english translation: This hat is very light and comfortable to wear.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya melihat seorang wanita berjalan sendirian di jalan.
english translation: I saw a woman walking alone on the street.
